response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $8,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, which I believe strikes a fair balance between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth. This opportunity won't last long, so I encourage you to consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
